what: NYC Dog Licensing Data set — nycdogs
title: NYC Dog Licensing Data set — nycdogs
text: NYC dog licensing data July 1, 2022 update.

title: NYC Dog Licensing Data set — nycdogs
NYC Dog Licensing Data set — nycdogs
text: data frame 508,196 rows 8 columns: animal_name User-provided dog name (unless specified otherwise) animal_gender M (Male) F (Female) dog gender animal_birth_year Year dog born breed_name Dog breed zip_code Owner zip code license_issued_date Date dog license issued license_expired_date Date dog license expires extract_year Year data extracted

title: NYC Dog Licensing Data set — nycdogs
Spotify song data — spotify
text: Song-level data top 50 genre-based "Sounds ..." playlists Spotify. top genres determined using https://everynoise.com, linked playlists.

title: Spotify song data — spotify
text: data frame 5,000 rows 21 columns: id unique track identifier name track name artist artist name popularity song popularity 0 (low) 100 (high) album.id id album song appears album.name name album song appears album.release_date album released playlist_id unique playlist identifier playlist_genre genre playlist danceability score 0 (danceable) 100 (danceable) based features tempo, rhythm, etc. energy score 0 (low energy) 100 (high energy) based features loudness, timbre, entropy, etc. key song key loudness song loudness (dB) mode 0 (minor key) 1 (major key) speechiness score 0 (non-speechy tracks) 100 (speechy tracks) acousticness score 0 (acoustic) 100 (acoustic) instrumentalness score 0 (instrumental) 100 (instrumental) liveness score 0 (live audience presence song) 100 (strong live audience presence song) valence score 0 (song negative, sad, angry) 100 (song positive, happy, euphoric) tempo song tempo (beats per minute) duration_ms song duration (ms)
